title: Holding Onto A Great Company Culture: Johnson Tractor 2012 Dealership of the Year

tasks.task: Working as an equipment dealer in a dynamic company in the Pacific Northwest.
subtasks: Serving the equipment dealer market for 30 years.
Following principles of honesty and being the best for customers.
Adapting to the hard work culture in the spring and fall seasons.
Ensuring customers minimize downtime during peak agricultural periods.
Employing committed and flexible staff who put in extra effort.
Promoting teamwork and problem-solving among employees.
